text: Madison De La Garza celebrated her sweet 16 on Monday, with a little help from her famous sister Demi Lovato. De La Garza, who played Eva Longoria ’ s daughter Juanita on “ Desperate Housewives, ” looked every bit the princess in a beautiful tiara and sleeveless silk gown with a sheer skirt. She celebrated with a vanilla three - tiered Cold Stone Creamery cake decorated with snowflakes, and ice cream in flavors like dark chocolate peppermint. Madison and Demi did some singing and dancing too, enjoying hits like Fergie ‘ s “ Fergalicious, ” Justin Timberlake ’ s “ Rock Your Body, ” and, Lovato ’ s song with Luis Fonsi, “ Not On You. ” Demi wasn
